explains: n. 人事改组；（体系）剧变；动摇

sentences.en: Community leaders say a complete departmental shake-up is needed.
sentences.cn: 社区领导人说需要进行一次彻底的部门大改组。

sentences.en: He went on to intimate that he was indeed contemplating a shake-up of the company.
sentences.cn: 他接着暗示他确实在考虑对公司进行一次改组。

sentences.en: The shake-up aims to recast IBM as a federation of flexible and competing subsidiaries.
sentences.cn: 此次改组旨在将IBM重组为一个灵活且相互竞争的子公司联盟。
